Radar Display
=============

Creating a Radar display
------------------------

  
First you must have created an instance of a [User Display Panel](../../userDisplayHelp/docs/userDisplayPanel.html)

From the User Display menu select _**User Display>New Radar displa**_yï¿½

A Radar Display Parameters dialog will open allowing you to select the type of radar display.

Click Ok and the radar display will be added to the [user display panel](../../userDisplayHelp/docs/userDisplayPanel.html).
